content: I'd sort of been wondering whether I could keep an open action for a full year. :) However, events related to the current normative technical correction suggest the need for the policy has become more urgent. So I've created a Google doc with a draft policy. Time allowing, we'll talk about this on Thursday: https://docs.google.com/document/d/1HEFLvLxWL8YIqMURFD5G8-OusLUijtZ8tendojG2nmI
<retracted, sorry wasn't paying attention to the channel!>:rolling_eyes:
